text: John Shelton Wilder (June 3, 1921 – January 1, 2010) was an American politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in Mason, Tennessee. He was the 48th Lieutenant Governor of Tennessee for 36 years from January 1971 to January 2007. He lost his re-election in 2006.Tennessee Senate, Tennessee Blue Book 2007–2008, page 28 He is the longest serving Lieutenant Governor in the history of the United States. He was a Tennessee state senator from 1959 to 1961 and again from 1967 to 2009. Wilder died on January 1, 2010 in Memphis, Tennessee from a stroke, aged 88. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Lieutenant Governors of Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John Shelton Wilder
